trans-unit.source: Supports the ASP.NET page parser in building an instance of a user control.
trans-unit.target: 支援 ASP.NET 網頁剖析器建置使用者控制項的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: By default, every user control on a page is associated with a default <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，每個頁面上的使用者控制項是預設值相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder>類別。

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 不使用網頁開發人員<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: User control authors might create custom user control builder functionality by extending this class.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項作者可能會延伸這個類別來建立自訂使用者控制項產生器 」 功能。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Builds an instance of the control identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 建置由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType" /> 屬性所識別之控制項的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a user control identified by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ControlType" /> 所識別之使用者控制項的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the control builder needs to get the control's inner text.
trans-unit.target: 判斷控制項產生器是否必須取得控制項的內部文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control builder requires the control's inner text; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項產生器需要控制項的內部文字，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A> method returns `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method is called.
When the control is built in a designer environment, the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具的環境中，建立控制項時<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Provides the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder" /> object with the inner text of the control tag.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制項標記的內部文字給 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UserControlControlBuilder" /> 物件。
